TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: 26 more points until I have too many rep bars.

I have exactly 100 points left until I get my first bar.
I'm at 120 points. not entirely sure how much more I need for a new bar.
57 away from 2 bars
Infinity.

99 points, then i'll have two light green bars.

...That's the perfect post, right there, according to what I get rep for.
Only 61 more! It's something, I guess!
About 150.

a lot to just get to 2 bars

A lot of this rep has come from my friend CG\_Kerbin and Starwhip. Thank you guys, you're awesome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

No count from me, but am VERY happy to have given a newbie his first rep a little while ago, on his 4th post. It's a good feeling to turn a gray bar green ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yeah, I always do that. :/
